attributes.title: Stinky

attributes.review:
I donâ€™t even know where to begin my review because the truth is that I have been violated in multiple ways. Through my constitutional rights to being a human being in a free country. To allowing myself the opportunity to live in solace. To not being scared of the world while an overgrown puppet throws his way around in the White House.

This app has a significant number of flaws! The first one is that it is very, very slow. 

The second problem with the app, is that itâ€™s not current and up-to-date on the worlds problems. 

The third problem is that it is draining me. It is extremely taxing! Sometimes, emotionally debilitating. 

And finally, the last problem! Itâ€™s not accepting of all of its users! It only works for a small percentage of people who fit into its mold. 

It would be 1000% better if the app wore a mask! But given the fact that itâ€™s on so many antibiotics for its STDâ€™s, it probably doesnâ€™t believe it needs to be wearing a mask, anymore.
attributes.title: I Was Violated

attributes.review: I downloaded this for my parents since they are big fans of President Trump. After downloading, they both had their front facing cameras turn on several times without them accessing the cameras themselves. I didnâ€™t believe it at first but then I took the devices to my husbandâ€™s office because he is a professional hacker hired by banks to test their digital security systems. He checked their phones and iPads and sure enough, this app scrapes data from your phone, turns on your cameras and your mics without your knowledge. When we tried to delete the app, all 4 devices crashed.
attributes.title: Accessed private data on your device
